entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: aziulll/trakk: trakk is a lightweight and scalable API for collecting and storing custom events from web and mobile applications. Built with NestJS and MongoDB, it allows seamless tracking of user actions such as page views, clicks, and interactions for future analytics

entry.content: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: Helias74/doubles_cles: doubles_cles is a lightweight web application that allows users to book appointments for car key duplication services in multiple locations. The site is built with React (frontend) and FastAPI (backend), and uses SQLite for local data storage. There is no payment or messaging system ‚Äî appointment confirmations are handled via email redirects.
entry.content: doubles_cles is a lightweight web application that allows users to book appointments for car key duplication services in multiple locations. The site is built with React (frontend) and FastAPI (backend), and uses SQLite for local data storage. There is no payment or messaging system ‚Äî appointment confirmations are handled via email redirects.
